channel.title: HKG:3333 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:3333 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Evergrande to Delist in Milestone for China Housing Crisis
item.description: China Evergrande Group said its Hong Kong stock will be delisted, marking the end of an era for the former high-flying developer whose demise came to symbolize the country’s property bust.
